review: so far so good. works great with phone or tablet, but extremely laggy when casting from a laptop.
author: chrissy

review: We love chrome casting.  There are some challenges sometimes (slow casting or no casting) but the good outweighs the difficulties.
author: dovebeloved

review: easy to config, but signal response poorly.
author: Trung Nguyen

review: This is a great product. I have bought 4 of them for my family.
author: Aaron Espinoza

review: I love Chromecast! We have two of them for both of our TVs. It's so convenient to be able to stream videos and movies for our little guys!
author: emwong

review: Nice, simple, and easy to setup. We use it when we are out of town and want to watch a movie or listen to music where ever we are.
author: C. Schumacher

review: Works great! Makes it so easy to stream to any tv, even from my phone! I love it!
author: crochetedjewels
